attacks.name: Grind
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy attached to Dark Tyranitar.

attacks.name: Spinning Tail
attacks.effect: Does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Bite Off
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon is Pokémon-ex, this attack does 70 damage plus 50 more damage.
